channel.title: Abouts on Nikiforos Pittaras
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Nikiforos Pittaras

item.title: About
item.description: I am a computer scientist currently employed as a researcher at the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications of the National Center for Scientific Research Demokritos. I am currently working on event detection from text and news sources, automatic summarization, big data and machine learning. You can get a pdf of my detailed cv here (Updated 09/2017) (Updated 09/2017). Alternatively, you can check out a tl;dr version below. Education MSc in Signal and Information Processing and Learning from the Informatics and Telecommunications department of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens.
